So yeah, how many of you would drop by if I was to start streaming book discussions/ History talking on the regular ?

WRITING.TITLE: Billions just keeps killing it.

I have never been one to hang out just to make sure I catch episodes of a show as they are released, but with Billions I have no choice. This show is pure amazing genius. I love it so much, I think about it when not watching it.
